about_the_game:
This is the demo version of TCSTRIKERS4, the biggest news title of 2021.

A cute bullet-hell shooter is now available.
It features cool and futuristic visuals and active gameplay.

There's no need to be afraid of the bullet screen.
I aimed for a game balance that is easy for beginners and deeply enjoyable for advanced players.


○Story

Joshua, you've changed your phone?
Yeah because Budget's phones are crap.
Yeah, I know. That company sucks.

Hi guys!
Hi, what are you up to?
Do you know anything about that big building on the edge of town?
Yes, I saw it but I'm afraid I don't know anything about it.
I see. Some say it's creepy. It's a troublesome thing.
Do you want me to go and investigate?
You? Are you sure?
Could you waive the advertising costs permanently instead?
Yeah, fine.
Thank you, Sir.
This may look like a sea lion, but this is our Director.
Joshua, get out of here!


○User Guide

Z:Shot(Decide)
X:PowerShot,CrushCancel(Cancel)
Shift:Laser
C:Accel(Increase FPS)
ESC:Pause

During the PowerShot, the laser eliminates bullets.

Skip conversation:Hold down shot and laser
　
Alt+Enter:Fullscreen

name: TCSTRIKERS4 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
